description.@en: Winter’s frost coats everything along the ground, making it slippery and exceedingly dangerous underfoot.

data.distance: Any one place you can see

criticalFailure.@en: The heat of a summer wind envelops you. Your head begins to sweat profusely, as you are suddenly placed under Stress. You immediately suffer [[/roll 3D10+3]] physical Peril. In addition, reduce your Combat Movement by 9 (to a minimum of 1) for the spell’s Duration.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foes cannot Resist this Magick while upon the ice.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you conjure forth a sheet of frigid ice, insufferably cold and debilitating to the touch, and lay it over the ground. All those who are caught within the Explosion Template immediately suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in physical Peril. The ice is considered to be Hard Terrain. In addition, those attempting to move upon the Hoarfrost must Resist with a Coordination Test or be left Helpless on their Turn.

reagents.@en: A vial of melted snow from a mountain, poured out (expended)
